name: Cribbage Solitaire
shortDescription: A unique single-player blend of Cribbage and Solitaire, featuring score tracking, daily challenges, and customizable boards.
fullDescription:
Cribbage Solitaire combines the strategic scoring of Cribbage with the relaxing flow of Solitaire, creating a fresh twist on two classic card games. The goal is to build hands that score points based on Cribbage combinations while progressing through a Solitaire-style layout.

Key Features:

  • Hybrid Gameplay: A creative mix of Cribbage scoring and Solitaire mechanics for an engaging single-player experience.
  • Score Tracking: Keep record of your current, daily, and highest scores to improve your performance over time.
  • Daily Challenges: Test your skills in new puzzles each day and aim for the highest scores.
  • Customization: Personalize the game by selecting from various card styles, board designs, and background themes.
  • Learn & Play: Includes an easy-to-follow tutorial for players new to Cribbage or Solitaire-style scoring.
